news.title: Miss Universe denies link with recently unveiled coin project
news.author: EZRA REGUERRA
news.lead: The Miss Universe Organization said that there is no Miss Universe cryptocurrency or blockchain offering involved with the Miss Universe or Miss Universe Philippines.

news.title: Couple mistakenly sent $10.5M by Crypto.com to face October plea hearing
news.author: EZRA REGUERRA
news.lead: Thevamanogari Manivel was sentenced to 18 months of community corrections with six months of unpaid community work, while her husband will face a plea trial in October.

news.title: Terra Classic community elects to cease USTC minting
news.author: CIARAN LYONS
news.lead: The community strongly backs stopping TerraUSD Classic (USTC) minting and reminting in favor of burning tokens to restore its U.S. dollar peg.

news.title: FTX’s former external legal team disputes involvement in fraud allegations
news.author: CIARAN LYONS
news.lead: In a recent court filing, a United States law firm that had previously offered services to FTX challenged allegations of assisting Sam Bankman-Fried in his alleged unlawful activities.

news.title: Coinbase secures AML registration from the Bank of Spain
news.author: CIARAN LYONS
news.lead: The Anti-Money Laundering registration will allow cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase to offer its services to retail and institutional investors in Spain.

news.title: Coinbase holds 5% of all Bitcoin in existence: Data
news.author: EZRA REGUERRA
news.lead: While Coinbase holds $25 billion in BTC, the exchange only owns around $200 million of Bitcoin in its wallets.

news.title: Coinbase CEO warns against AI regulation, calls for decentralization
news.author: EZRA REGUERRA
news.lead: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong said decentralization and open-sourcing AI is a better alternative to regulating the space.

news.title: Bitcoin miners double down on efficiency and renewable energy at the World Digital Mining Summit
news.author: RAY SALMOND
news.lead: Bitmain rolled out its efficiency-focused Antminer S21 at the WDMS, and Bitcoin miners shared their plans for boosting productivity via green energy.

news.title: DeFi activity on the decline, but investment rolls in: Finance Redefined
news.author: PRASHANT JHA
news.lead: The total value locked in DeFi plunged by nearly $5 billion in the past week, falling to $44 billion, according to DappRadar data.

news.title: Nifty News: Murakami to step back from NFTs, Dan Harmon’s NFT show debut and more
news.author: BRIAN QUARMBY
news.lead: Takashi Murakami said he might step back from NFTs but stay involved differently, Krapoplis is set to debut on Fox this month, and an NFT artist won a multimillion-dollar contract dispute.

news.title: Base surges past Solana as total value locked nears $400M
news.author: BRIAN QUARMBY
news.lead: As per DefiLlama data, Solana’s TVL has decreased by 9.64% over the past month to sit at $358.96 million, while Base’s TVL has surged to $397.32 million.

news.title: Crypto Biz: Bidding war for SVB Capital, new crypto funds and Citi’s private blockchain
news.author: ANA PAULA PEREIRA
news.lead: This week’s Crypto Biz explores SVB Capital bids, new funds from Blockchain Capital, the Hut 8-US Bitcoin merger and Citigroup’s private blockchain.

news.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
news.author: SERGE EGON OSTMAN
news.lead: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

news.title: Coinbase sought FTX Europe acquisition after bankruptcy: Report
news.author: ANA PAULA PEREIRA
news.lead: To expand its derivatives business overseas, Coinbase attempted to acquire FTX Europe twice since it filed for bankruptcy in November 2022.

news.title: Architect fintech receives NFA approval to operate as introducing broker
news.author: DEREK ANDERSEN
news.lead: The former president of FTX US founded the company in January to serve institutional investors in crypto and traditional derivatives.
